English for Academic Purposes 2

English for Academic Purposes aims to build on students’ existing English competencies and refine these towards discipline-specific academic contexts. In taking this course, students will have a greater understanding of the conventions and formalities present in academic English alongside developing their ability to create texts and language deemed appropriate for academic purposes. Students will also explore fundamental notions surrounding research such as selecting appropriate sources, identifying stance and perspective, which will better prepare them for their future academic endeavours.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Apply knowledge on business and management principles suitable for further study.

+  Demonstrate understanding of key contemporary business concepts.

+  Gain the ability to analyse the business external environment.
